name: Sharpness
description: This pokemon uses blades that can only be called truly razor sharp!
effect:
Slicing moves gain 1 additional damage dice. These moves include:
- Aerial Ace
 -Air Cutter
 -Air Slash
 -Aqua Cutter
 -Ceaseless Edge
 -Fury Cutter
 -Leaf Blade
 -Night Slash
 -Psycho Cut
 -Razor Shell
 -Sacred Sword
 -Slash
 -Stone Axe
 -X-Scissor
